Define Documentation

#define BUFSIZE   2048

use by NF_QUEUE to set the data size of received packets

Referenced by netlink_loop().

#define CONF_MAX_LINE   1024

max size of a line in the configuration file

#define DESTSIZE   15

Decision Engine thread enabled

Two strategies: with thread or with libev If USE_LIBEV is defined, the program loops on the main libev loop:

  • packets on queue are processed through libev callback
  • connection structures are cleaned by libev timer If not, then the program loops on nfqueue:
  • packets on queue are processed through nfqueue callback
  • connection structures are cleaned by a thread

max size of an IP address (4*3 = 12 + 3 dots = 15)

#define G_STATIC_RW_LOCK_INIT   { G_STATIC_MUTEX_INIT, NULL, NULL, 0, FALSE, 0, 0 }

writing lock initialization

#define G_THREADS_ENABLED

Multi-thread safe mode

use by NF_QUEUE to set the data size of received packets

#define RESET_HIH   0

use to reset (1) or accept (0) connections initiated by HIH

#define VERSION   "1.0"

int yyparse ( void   ) 

We store a pointer to GKeyFile object in the module hash table

We then check if the file exists. Otherwise we create it

If the file exists, we try to load it into memory

Todo:
free all these structures, and close file descriptor when exiting

We store a pointer to the module function in the module hash table If the module function isn't defined in get_module(), the application will exit and display an error message
